trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANARK109_04559_SEQ_00<tab>Maru is anxiously awaiting someone's return.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANARK109_04559_MARU_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you haven't seen a broodin' Rider carryin' a couple of jugs of valras oil, have you?
TEXT_BANARK109_04559_MARU_000_001<tab>He's a tough bloke, so I didn't think twice about sendin' him off to pummel valras─but now I'm worried somethin' might've happened.
TEXT_BANARK109_04559_MARU_000_002<tab>I reckon you're even tougher than he is, so would you mind seekin' him out? He should be on the Perfumed Rise somewhere─an' hopefully he ain't dismantled.
TEXT_BANARK109_04559_ROUGHDELIVERER04559_000_010<tab>...I owe you my thanks. Circumstances forbade my retreat.
TEXT_BANARK109_04559_ROUGHDELIVERER04559_000_011<tab>I shall retrieve the oil and return posthaste. Tell this to Maru, if you would.
TEXT_BANARK109_04559_ROUGHDELIVERER04559_000_012<tab>Upon seeing this fragile creature in mortal peril, I am shamed to admit that I forgot myself... Tell Maru I shall return with the oil anon.
TEXT_BANARK109_04559_MARU_000_020<tab>Did you find him in one piece?
TEXT_BANARK109_04559_MARU_000_021<tab>Of course he did... He's usually a sober-minded fellow, but all bets are off when a little critter gets involved.
TEXT_BANARK109_04559_MARU_000_022<tab>Anyway, I'm relieved to hear he's alright. Wasn't sure what I was gonna do if he wasn't...
TEXT_BANARK109_04559_MARU_000_023<tab>I'll keep this in mind the next time I send him out on a job. Thanks for helpin' out as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
